assetProfile.address2: Floor 40 Khaled Ibn Alwaleed Street, Sharq
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Gulf Insurance Group K.S.C.P., together with its subsidiaries, provides various insurance products and services for individuals and businesses. The company operates in two segments, General Risk Insurance, and Life and Medical Insurance. The General Risk Insurance segment provides general insurance products comprising marine and aviation; motor vehicles; and property, engineering, and general accidents insurance products. The Life and Medical Insurance segment offers savings, protection products, and other long-term contracts. This segment also provides whole life insurance, term insurance, unitized pensions, pure endowment pensions, group life and disability insurance, and credit life insurance, as well as group medical insurance consisting of third-party administration, preferred global health, and FAY products. In addition, the company provides life takaful insurance, as well as reinsurance services. It operates in Kuwait, GCC countries, and other Middle East countries. The company was formerly known as Gulf Insurance Company K.S.C. Gulf Insurance Group K.S.C.P. was incorporated in 1962 and is based in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
